author: nddelima
msg: Fix for defect http://nagoya.apache.org/jira/browse/XERCESJ-864 so that Node.getBaseURI consistently returns null if the URI to return is malformed.

author: sandygao
msg: We used to ignore leading zeros in the fractional part of date/time "second" values;
we used to retain trailing zeros in the fractional part of data/time "second" values.

author: mrglavas
msg: Updating the XJavac task to better future proof it against
later versions of Ant which are aware of JDK versions
beyond 1.4. For instance, Ant 1.6.1 started detecting
JDK 1.5 but XJavac was only checking for JDK 1.4.

author: mrglavas
msg: Once we've created an XPathEvaluator, cache it to avoid
looking it up again and creating it using reflection.

author: mrglavas
msg: Adding back some methods which were renamed between
DOM Level 3 drafts for compatibility with older applications
which were early adopters of this API.
